name: Cyberblade
descriptionPower: Deal 2 damage to 1 target on your square.
descriptionFirstAdditivePower: Move 1 square before or after the basic effect.
descriptionSecondAdditivePower: Deal 2 damage to a different target on your square. The shadowstep may be used before or after this effect.

name: Machine Gun
descriptionPower: Choose 1 or 2 targets you can see and deal 1 damage to each.
descriptionFirstAdditivePower: Deal 1 additional damage to one of those targets.
descriptionSecondAdditivePower: Deal 1 additional damage to the other of those targets and/or deal 1 damage to a different target you can see.

name: Rocket Launcher
descriptionPower: Deal 2 damage to 1 target you can see that is not on your square. Then you may move the target 1 square.
descriptionFirstAdditivePower: Move 1 or 2 squares. This effect can be used either before or after the basic effect.
descriptionSecondAdditivePower: During the basic effect, deal 1 damage to every player on your target's original square – including the target, even if you move it.

name: Plasma Gun
descriptionPower: Deal 2 damage to 1 target you can see.
descriptionFirstAdditivePower: Move 1 or 2 squares. This effect can be used either before or after the basic effect.
descriptionSecondAdditivePower: Deal 1 additional damage to your target.

name: T.H.O.R.
descriptionPower: Deal 2 damage to 1 target you can see.
descriptionFirstAdditivePower: Deal 1 damage to a second target that your first target can see.
descriptionSecondAdditivePower: Deal 2 damage to a third target that your second target can see. You cannot use this effect unless you first use the chain reaction.
